outputs.output_descr:
The Strengthening of the Parliament of Trinidad and Tobago project outputs are as follows:
1) A Comprehensive Strategic Development Plan of Parliament and a multi-year UNDP project document to support its implementation
2) Legislative functioning of parliament strengthened
3) Outreach and communication of Parliament strengthened
4) Functional (administrative and financial) autonomy of Parliament established
5) Monitoring & Evaluation

These outputs are intended to be in direct support of the Country Programme Outcome 'Governance structures are more responsive' and 'Creating an enabling environment for sustainable development'

project_descr: The Strengthening of the Parliament of Trinidad and Tobago project aims to strengthen the parliament of Trinidad and Tobago in carrying out its functions and responsibilities, based upon a comprehensive approach to parliamentary development.
project_title: Strengthening the Parliament of Trinidad and Tobago
